subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees were hit with a tax bill of $23.88 million by Major League Baseball on Friday, down from $26 million last year and from a high of $33.98 million in 2005.
snippet: The Yankees were hit with a tax bill of $23.88 million by Major League Baseball on Friday, down from $26 million last year and from a high of $33.98 million in 2005.
